OOC: I'm using e-mail through the group because the NBW site is down, hones=
tly. Anyway, I didn't use to watch WCW, because the bookers were so stupid,=
 but that's no reason to discredit the amazing wrestlers. Seriously, I woul=
d never call someone bad if they really wasn't. I mean, I know the Rock can=
 do incredible things, he just chooses not to. He's actually lazy. Where ar=
e his acrobatics, eh?

BIC: The Radicons look at the ship that some of them=
 had rode down in.

Stranato: I'm starting to think we should leave this pl=
anet...

  To: nbwrpg@=
yahoogroups.com

ing

ke it

ut Sting has never been in

dies, and then went to
  Gerogia Championship Wrestling of the National Wre=
stling Alliance. He
  has been there ever since, because Georgia Championsh=
ip Wrestling became
  World Championship Wrestling.

  And KSL, you had to =
go insult WCW, the promotion that made me a fan. I
  got into wrestling, wa=
tching WCW with my dad in 93. They have the most
  amazing star and have al=
ways been the better promotion. You say they
  have no talent, well DDP and=
 Booker T. are the only extreamly good stars
  they have now. But lets talk=

  Kevin Nash, Scott Hall, Bret Hart, Chris Beno=
it, Chris Jericho, Scott
  Steiner, Rick Steiner, Arn Anderson, Ricky Steam=
boat, Sting, Curt
  Hening, Rey Masterio Jr., Billy Kidman, Road Warriors, =
Dusty Rhodes,
  Hulk Hogan, and the greatest wrestler of all time, the Natu=
re Boy Ric
  Flair. Of course there are many I didn't mention.

  Oh you do=
nt know who Scott Steiner is, KSL? Well he signed with WWF and
  should sho=
w up in a few months. You should be amazed. He got the mic
  skills, and as=
 far as physical shape goes, there is not one man in WWF,
  WCW, or ECW tha=
t can match up.
